О нас

Oriental Road Tour

We are a leading luxury travel company specializing in exclusive tailor-made tours in Central Asia and around the world.Our tours are private and highly personalized, designed for discerning travelers who expect the highest levels of luxury, service and attention to detail from the moment you start planning your trip until the day you return home. The tour is flexible, with your own expert and driver at each destination, and adapts each day to your personal interests, schedule, energy level and travel preferences.

Tours in Uzbekistan

We carry out our activities in the tourism market and is a guarantee of high quality service and services at the most reasonable prices. We offer a wide range of tours: both classical, with a visit to the world famous cities of Uzbekistan.
